amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funds for Afghanistan Relief and Reconstruction by $70 million to support the human rights needs of Afghan women and girls; and sought to transfer $300 million within the funds for Iraq Reconstruction to the areas of human rights, education, refugees and democracy and governance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide $300 million for use by Afghan women's programs, including $10 million for the Afghan Independent Human Rights Commission and $24 million for the Ministry of Women's Affairs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 271 (Roll no. 556).
